pages: This helmet resembles an anglerfish's lure. Maybe I could use it as a torch of some sort.
These flippers should let me swim a little higher. Maybe I can squeeze into small spaces with this.
This propeller seems powerful. I shouldn't need to push off the ground to jump anymore.
This pressure suit will let me open those yellow airlocks.
This beam should be able to trigger blue doors and fend off enemies.
I should probably look for stuff to get me out of here.
I'll explore using the Arrow Keys and Spacebar.
